entry.title: WIND WARNING , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:56 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 11.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 5:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: 11.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: 6.1°C
Wind: SW 47 km/h gust 67 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending early this evening then cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 early this evening then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
